functions.name: List available backends
functions.description: Lists all available Qiskit backends that the user has access to

active_account.description: Information about the currently active account, if any

functions.name: Create a bell quantum circuit
functions.description: Creates a quantum circuit that prepares a Bell state (entangled state) using Qiskit

circuit_representation.description: String representation of the quantum circuit

circuit_drawing.description: ASCII art representation of the circuit

functions.name: Create a custom quantum circuit
functions.description: Creates a custom quantum circuit based on OpenQASM 2.0 code

parameters.name: instructions
parameters.description: OpenQASM 2.0 code for building the quantum circuit

circuit_representation.description: String representation of the quantum circuit

circuit_drawing.description: ASCII art representation of the circuit

num_qubits.description: Number of qubits in the circuit

num_clbits.description: Number of classical bits in the circuit

functions.name: Execute quantum circuit
functions.description: Executes a quantum circuit on a Qiskit backend and returns the results

parameters.name: qasm_code
parameters.description: OpenQASM 2.0 code for the quantum circuit to execute

parameters.name: shots
parameters.description: Number of times to run the circuit (default: 1024)

parameters.name: backend
parameters.description: Backend to use for execution (default: aer_simulator)

counts.description: Measurement results as a dictionary of bit strings and counts

circuit_drawing.description: ASCII art representation of the executed circuit

backend_name.description: Name of the backend used for execution

execution_time.description: Time taken to execute the circuit in seconds
